name: fullstackopen-part3-backend
description: This is the backend for the phonebook application

scripts.build-ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../Full-Stack-Open/Part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../../fullstackopen-part3-backend
scripts.deploy: npm run build-ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push origin main

author: Natnael Alemayehu <se.natnael.alemayehu@gmail.com>
